We went in for two prepaid SIM cards with 2GB of data and they sold us two with only 600 MB. When we discovered their error, at first they said we could just top up for ‚Ç¨10 to 2GB, but when went in to do so a manager told us we had to buy a totally new plan for ‚Ç¨30 each. Now we have no data for 3/4 of our time in Paris. Be careful to check what they are selling you, even if you're fluent in French.
